attributes.action: Islands for prisoners instead of prisons.
attributes.additional_details: Lets use none populated islands to house serious offenders. E.G. , murderers, pedophiles and rapists on separate islands. They will have to look after themselves on there respected island. The state will give them a starter pack of a tent and one weeks rations. After that they will have to survive on their own initiative and hunting skills. This will ensure they learn how to survive in a social environment of their own making and it will reduce the cost of looking after the prisoners for the state. It will also be a huge deterrent for future potential offenders.
